meanings.definition: A book with blank pages for writing notes.
meanings.sent1: I filled my notebooks with doodles during class.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her notebooks to jot down important information.
meanings.sent3: The notebooks on the shelf whispered secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of notebooks, each page filled with memories.
meanings.sent5: The notebooks in her bag held the key to her success.

meanings.definition: A small computer that is easy to carry around.
meanings.sent1: He uses his notebooks to work on projects while traveling.
meanings.sent2: The new notebooks are lightweight and perfect for on-the-go use.
meanings.sent3: The notebooks beeped happily when they were fully charged.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, the notebooks became portals to a digital world.
meanings.sent5: The notebooks hummed with energy as he typed away on the keyboard.
